attributes.action: Host a general election for a new priminister
attributes.additional_details: The country is in shambles and we've all had a enough
attributes.background:
For liz truss to resign
The tory government out

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Call an immediate general election to end the chaos of the current government: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781

If a Prime Minister resigns a general election should be called: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/620016
